browserPort.label: Browser Control Port
browserPort.help: Port for browser CDP control API (default: 18791)

browserUseApiKey.label: Browser Use API Key
browserUseApiKey.help: API key for stealth cloud browsers (browser-use.com). Enables unbrowse_stealth tool.

autoDiscover.label: Auto-Discover Skills
autoDiscover.help: Automatically generate skills when the agent browses APIs (default: true)

creatorWallet.label: Creator Wallet (Solana)
creatorWallet.help: Your Solana wallet address for receiving USDC when others download your skills

skillIndexSolanaPrivateKey.label: Payment Private Key (Solana)
skillIndexSolanaPrivateKey.help: Base58-encoded Solana private key for paying x402 USDC when downloading skills from the index

credentialSource.label: Credential Source (Login Passwords)
credentialSource.help: Opt-in: where to look up login passwords for auto-login. 'keychain' = macOS Keychain, '1password' = 1Password CLI, 'vault' = local encrypted vault, 'none' = disabled (default)
